data.text: Great place to be. Nice spacious rooms with good Creek view. Housekeeping was at its best. Kaushal and mahadev done fantastic job cleaned the room very well and very professionally.  Room has good kitchen facilities as well. Gym is quiet spacious well equiped
data.title: Comfortable rooms

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear valued customer,

Thank you for sharing your experience! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. It's wonderful to know that you found our rooms comfortable, with a great Creek view, and appreciated the excellent housekeeping service provided by Kaushal and Mahadev. We're also glad you found our gym spacious and well-equipped. Your feedback is greatly appreciated, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another great stay!
owner_response.author: Hyatt Regency Dubai Creek Heights

data.text:
It’s great experience at Hyatt regency ,
All services were above expectations especially house keeping services Mr Arjun, Ms Gita, and  Sonora also room services, front desk…………………………………
Really unforgettable experience ……………………. …..
data.title: Great service, safff, cleaness, facilities and more

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear valued customer,

Thank you for your wonderful review! We're delighted to hear that you had a great experience at Hyatt Regency and that all services exceeded your expectations. It's fantastic that you appreciated the great service, cleanliness, facilities, and more during your stay. We'll be sure to pass along your compliments to Arjun, Ms. Gita, Sonora, and the rest of our team. Providing unforgettable experiences for our guests is what we strive for, and we can't wait to welcome you back again soon for another memorable stay!
owner_response.author: Hyatt Regency Dubai Creek Heights

data.text: Thank you for amazing experience. Specially the house keeping department. For taking care of us in every possible way. Hardworking and dedicated team. Special mention to shakil for best experience. The room was always super clean always.
data.title: Housekeeping department

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Thank you for your wonderful feedback! We're thrilled to hear that you had an amazing experience, especially with our housekeeping department. It's fantastic to know that our team took care of you in every possible way and that Shakil provided you with the best experience. We'll be sure to pass along your kind words to our hardworking and dedicated team. Keeping our guests' rooms super clean is our priority, and we're delighted that we could meet your expectations. Thank you for choosing us, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another fantastic stay!
owner_response.author: Hyatt Regency Dubai Creek Heights

data.text:
I am permanent resident in this property.
Housekeeping service is really good all year long.
Arjun in particular is really great professional and always provide excellent service. He is very kind and helpful.
I definitely recommend this place.
data.title: Great service! 👌🏼👌🏼

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Thank you for your wonderful feedback! We're thrilled to hear that you've had a great experience with our service, especially with our housekeeping team. It's fantastic to hear that Arjun has consistently provided you with excellent service and that he's been particularly helpful and kind. Your recommendation means a lot to us, and we're grateful for your ongoing support as a permanent resident. We look forward to continuing to exceed your expectations during your stays with us!
owner_response.author: Hyatt Regency Dubai Creek Heights

data.text:
I had good experience in hyatt hotel creek height staff very kind housekeeping team friendly shakil and jayaram and santhosh kumar and hotel was good view from my room and my checking process also good and staff all good kind
I am so happy to share the feedback i will suggested my friend and family
data.title: Good property

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Customer,

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Hyatt Regency Dubai Creek Heights.

We're delighted to hear that you had a good stay and that our staff, especially Shakil, Jayaram, and Santhosh Kumar from the housekeeping team, provided you with friendly service. Your recommendation means a lot to us, and we're thrilled to know that you would suggest our hotel to your friends and family.

We look forward to welcoming you back and providing you with another excellent stay in the future.
owner_response.author: Hyatt Regency Dubai Creek Heights
